phrs.translation: 萨克拉河岸, 萨克拉, 里贝拉萨克拉, 神圣河岸
圣地红景天, 红景天, 提取物

sentences.sentence: The sphere preserved to the Roman sacra in the time of Cicero, was not less in extent.
sentences.translation: 西塞罗时代罗马家祭所保存的范围，也并不小于印度。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the way of resection of sacrum tumors and the reconstruction way of the sacra.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨骶骨肿瘤切除和骶骨重建方式。

sentences.sentence: Ughelli gave them two volumes in folio of notes which he had collected for the completion of his "Italia Sacra".
sentences.translation: 乌盖利给了他们两册英文排版的笔记，他已经收集了为完成他的“意大利骶”。
